name: OpenUp! - prototype
description:
This is a prototype for the recreation of Door Kickers 2.
Made for the Platform Development 2 course at DAE Howest.

move camera by leftclicking and draging, zoom with scroll
press SPACE to unpause/pause to move player
leftclick player and drag to create path
rightclick to create fov direction

press tab to open console, type "help" for commands

type "realisticLook" for first-person mode

Any feedback is welcome!
